name: WEBDIGITA
description:
Webdigita is a full-service design & development agency specializing in eCommerce development, cloud solutions, UI/UX, CRM Systems, business sites & applications.
At WDT, we understand that digital impressions matter more than ever. As a strategic partner, we have worked with startups, SMB's & Fortune 500 companies to empower their businesses, capitalize on the digital revolution, accelerate their growth, reduce costs and bring in better ROI.
Since 2011, we have been pursuing a set of values as definitive guidelines for providing quality services to our clients and are committed to offering time-tested contribution by innovation in the field of information technology.
Facts & Figures:
• 200+ project severed from SMBs to fortune 500 companies
• 150+ clients from 10+ countries
• 98% project success ratio
• Team members are English fluent and dedicated to your project
• If required we adapt to your tools, platforms, and processes
• Engage a single team or complete scaled agile organization
• Highly skilled domain experts
• Debt free organization
Partners & Accreditations:
• Google Marketing Partner
• Amazon AWS Technology Partner
• Bing Accredited Professional
• ISO 9001:2015 Certified
Core areas of practice:
UX/UI, web application development, eCommerce development, CRM consulting & setup, mobile application development, cloud consulting, setup & migration, QA, agile development.
READ MORE...

locations.address: 16, 6th Main Rd, Block R, Annanagar East
